name: Slenderman's Oddyssey
description:
Its a game based on the famous creepypasta character, Slenderman.

In this game you will face your fears with a flashlight and you will enter the different scenarios collecting the notes that persist in that scenario.

But not everything is good as there's something stalking you from the darkness, The Slender Man

ATTENTION! This game is still in development, so it currently lacks content.
